Verses: 1 avargal Erusalemukku Sameebamaai Serndhu, Olivamalaikku Arugaana Pedhpakeyukku Vandhapodhu, Yesuvaanavar Seeshargalil Iranduperai Nokki:
2 ungalukku Edhire Irukkira Giraamaththukkup Pongal; Ponavudane, Ange Oru Kazhudhaiyaiyum Adhanode Oru Kuttiyaiyum Kattiyirukkak Kaanpeergal; Avaigalai Avizhththu Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal.
3 oruvan Ungalukku Edhaagilum Sonnaal: Ivaigal Aandavarukku Vendumendru Sollungal; Udane Avaigalai Anuppividuvaan Endru Solli, Avargalai Anuppinaar.
4 idho, Un Raajaa Saandhagunamullavaraai, Kazhudhaiyin Melum Kazhudhaikkuttiyaagiya Mariyinmelum Erikkondu, Unnidaththil Varugiraar Endru Seeyonkumaaraththikku Sollungal Endru,
5 theerkkadharisiyinaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Idhellaam Nadandhadhu.
6 seeshargal Poi, Yesu Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Seydhu,
7 kazhudhaiyaiyum Kuttiyaiyum Konduvandhu, Avaigal Mel Thangal Vasthirangalaip Pottu, Avarai Etrinaargal.
8 thiralaana Janangal Thangal Vasthirangalai Vazhiyile Viriththaargal; Veru Silar Marakkilaigalaith Thariththu Vazhiyile Parappinaargal.

9 munnadappaarum, Pinnadappaarumaagiya Thiralaana Janangal: Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranukku Osannaa! Karththarin Naamaththinaale Varugiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar, Unnadhaththile Osannaa Endru Solli Aarppariththaargal.
10 avar Erusalemukkul Piravesikkaiyil, Nagaraththaar Yaavarum Aachchariyappattu, Ivar Yaar? Endru Visaariththaargal.
11 adharku Janangal: Ivar Galileyaavilulla Naasareththilirundhu Vandha Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Yesu Endraargal.

12 yesu Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Aalayaththile Virkiravargalum Kollugiravarkalumaagiya Yaavaraiyum Veliyile Thuraththi, Kaasukkaararudaiya Palagaigalaiyum Puraa Virkiravargalin Aasanangalaiyum Kavizhththu:
13 ennudaiya Veedu Jebaveedu Ennappadum Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu; Neengalo Adhaik Kallar Kugaiyaakkineergal Endraar.
14 appozhudhu, Kurudarum Sappaanigalum Dhevaalayaththile Avaritaththirku Vandhaargal, Avargalaich Sosthamaakkinaar.
15 avar Seydha Adhisayangalaiyum, Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranukku Osannaa! Endru Dhevaalayaththile Aarpparikkira Pillaigalaiyum, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaarakarum Kandu, Kobamadaindhu,

16 avarai Nokki: Ivargal Sollugiradhaik Ketkireero Endraargal. Adharku Yesu: Aam, Ketkiren. Kuzhandhaigaludaiya Vaayinaalum Paalagarudaiya Vaayinaalum Thuthi Undaakumpadi Seydheer Enbadhai Neengal Orukkaalum Vaasikkavillaiyaa Endraar.
17 avargalaivittu Nagaraththilirundhu Purappattu, Beththaaniyaavukkup Poi, Ange Raaththanginaar.
18 gaalaiyile Avar Nagaraththukku Thirumbi Varugaiyil, Avarukkup Pasi Undaayitru.

19 appozhudhu Vazhiyaruge Oru Aththimaraththaik Kandu, Adhanidaththir Poi, Adhile Ilaigalaiyandri Verondraiyum Kaanaamal: Ini Orukkaalum Unnidaththil Kani Undaakaadhirukkakkatavadhu Endraar; Udane Aththimaram Pattuppoyitru.
20 seeshargal Adhaikkandu: Indha Aththimaram Eththanai Seekkiramaaip Pattup Poyitru! Endru Solli Aachchariyappattaargal.

21 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Sandhegappadaamal Visuvaasamullavargalaayirundhaal, Indha Aththimaraththirku Seydhadhai Neengal Seyvadhumallaamal, Indha Malaiyaip Paarththu: Nee Peyarndhu Samuththiraththile Thallundupo Endru Sonnaalum Appadiyaagum Endru, Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
22 melum, Neengal Visuvaasamullavargalaai Jebaththile Evaigalaik Ketpeergalo Avaigalaiyellaam Peruveergal Endraar.

23 avar Dhevaalayaththil Vandhu, Ubadhesampannugaiyil, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Janaththin Moopparum Avaridaththil Vandhu: Neer Endha Adhikaaraththinaal Ivaigalai Seygireer? Indha Adhikaaraththai Umakkuk Koduththavar Yaar? Endru Kettaargal.

24 yesu Avargalukku Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naanum Ungalidaththil Oru Kaariyaththaik Ketkiren, Adhai Enakku Solluveergalaanaal, Naanum Inna Adhikaaraththinaale Ivaigalai Seygiren Endru Ungalukku Solluven.

25 yovaan Koduththa Snaanam Dhevanaal Undaayitro? Manusharaal Undaayitro? Yaaraal Undaayitru? Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avargal: Dhevanaal Undaayitru Endru Solvomaanaal, Pinnae En Avanai Visuvaasikkavillai Endru Nammaik Ketpaar;
26 manusharaal Undaayitrendru Solvomaanaal, Janangalukkup Bayappadugirom, Ellaarum Yovaanaith Theerkkaththarisi Endru Ennugiraargale Endru, Thangalukkulle Aalosanaipanni,
27 yesuvukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Engalukkuth Theriyaadhu Endraargal. Appozhudhu, Avar: Naanum Inna Adhikaaraththinaale Ivaigalai Seygirenendru Ungalukku Sollen Endraar.
28 aayinum Ungalukku Eppadiththondrugiradhu? Orumanushanukku Irandu Kumaarar Irundhaargal; Mooththavanidaththil Avan Vandhu: Magane, Nee Poi Indraikku En Thiraatchaththottaththil Velaisey Endraan.
29 adharku Avan: Maatten Endraan; Aagilum, Pinbu Avan Manasthaabappattup Ponaan.
30 ilaiyavanidaththilum Avan Vandhu Appadiye Sonnaan; Adharku Avan: Pogiren Aiyaa, Endru Solliyum, Pogavillai.

31 ivviruvaril Evan Than Thagappanudaiya Siththaththinpadi Seydhavan Endru Kettaar; Adharku Avargal: Mooththavan Thaan Endraargal. Appozhudhu, Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Aayakkaararum Vesigalum Ungalukku Munne Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesikkiraargal Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

32 enendraal, Yovaan Needhimaarkkamaai Ungalidaththil Vandhirundhum, Neengal Avanai Visuvaasikkavillai; Aayakkaararum Vesigalumo Avanai Visuvaasiththaargal; Adhai Neengal Kandum, Avanai Visuvaasikkumpadiyaagap Pinbaagilum Manasdhaapappadavillai Endraar.

33 veroru Uvamaiyaik Kelungal: Veettejamaanaagiya Oru Manushan Irundhaan, Avan Oru Thiraatchaththottaththai Undaakki, Adhai Sutrilum Veliyadaiththu, Adhil Oru Aalaiyai Naatti, Kopuraththaiyum Katti, Thottakkaararukku Adhaik Kuththakaiyaaga Vittu, Puradhesaththukkup Poyirundhaan.
34 kanigaalam Sameepiththapodhu, Adhin Kanigalai Vaangikkonduvarumpadi Than Oozhiyakkaararaith Thottakkaararidaththil Anuppinaan.
35 thottakkaarar Andha Oozhiyakkaararaip Pidiththu, Oruvanai Adiththu, Oruvanaik Kolaiseydhu, Oruvanaik Kallerindhu Kondraargal.
36 pinnum Avan Mundhinavargalilum Adhigamaana Vere Oozhiyakkaararai Anuppinaan; Avargalaiyum Appadiye Seydhaargal.
37 kadaisiyile Avan: En Kumaaranukku Anjuvaargal Endru Solli, Than Kumaaranai Avargalidaththil Anuppinaan.
38 thottakkaarar Kumaaranaik Kandapodhu: Ivan Sudhandharavaali, Ivanaik Kondru, Ivan Sudhandharaththaik Kattikkolluvom Vaarungal Endru Oruvarodoruvar Sollikkondu;
39 avanaip Pidiththuth Thiraatchaththottaththirkup Purambe Thallikkolai Seydhaargal.
40 appadiyirukka, Thiraatchaththottaththin Ejamaan Varumpodhu, Andha Thottakkaararai Enna Seyvaan Endru Kettaar.

41 adharku Avargal: Andhak Kodiyavaraik Kodumaiyaai Azhiththu, Etrakaalangalil Thanakkuk Kanigalaik Kodukkaththakka Vere Thottakkaararidaththil Thiraatchaththottaththaik Kuththagaiyaagak Koduppaan Endraargal.

42 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Veedu Kattugiravargal Aagaadhendru Thallina Kalle Moolaikkuth Thalaikkallaayitru, Adhu Karththaraale Aayitru, Adhu Nammudaiya Kangalukku Aachchariyamaayirukkiradhu Endru Neengal Vedhaththil Orukkaalum Vaasikkavillaiyaa?
43 aagaiyaal, Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Ungalidaththilirundhu Neekkappattu, Adharketra Kanigalaith Tharugira Janangalukkuk Kodukkappadum.
44 indhak Kallinmel Vizhugiravan Norungippovaan; Idhu Evan Mel Vizhumo Avanai Nasukkippodum Endru Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
45 piradhaana Aasaariyarum, Pariseyarum Avarudaiya Uvamaigalaikkettu, Thangalaikkuriththu Sollugiraar Endru Arindhu,
46 avaraip Pidikka Vagaidhedinaargal; Aagilum Janangal Avaraith Theerkkadharisi Endru Enninapadiyaal Avargalukkup Payandhirundhaargal.
